tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_inventory (
    tool_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tool_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    license_key VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    expiration_date DATE,
    renewal_reminder_sent BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE security_licenses (
    license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tool_id INT,
    license_key VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (tool_id) REFERENCES security_tools(tool_id)
);

CREATE TABLE security_tools (
    tool_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tool_name VARCHAR(100),
    license_key VARCHAR(50),
    expiration_date DATE,
    renewal_reminder DATE
);

CREATE TABLE tool_assignments (
    assignment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tool_id UUID,
    owner_id UUID,
    assigned_date DATE,
    return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE security_tools (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tool_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    license_key VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE,
    renewal_reminder DATE
);

CREATE TABLE tool_categories (
    tool_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY(tool_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tool_id) REFERENCES security_tools(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tool_id INT,
    notification_date DATE,
    message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (tool_id) REFERENCES security_tools(id)
);
CREATE TABLE security_tools (   tool_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   tool_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,   license_key VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,   expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,   reminder_date DATE NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE license_types (   license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   license_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,   description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE vendors (   vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   vendor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,   contact_person VARCHAR(255),   email VARCHAR(100),   phone_number VARCHAR(20) );

CREATE TABLE tool_vendors (   tool_id INT,   vendor_id INT,   FOREIGN KEY (tool_id) REFERENCES security_tools(tool_id),   FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id),   PRIMARY KEY (tool_id, vendor_id) );
CREATE TABLE renewal_history (   renewal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   tool_id INT,   renewal_date DATE NOT NULL,   amount_paid DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,   payment_method VARCHAR(50) );
